feature.name: War Priest
feature.shortDescription: When you use the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Guided Strike
action.shortDescription: You can strike with supernatural accuracy. When you make an attack roll, you can use your channel divinity to gain a +10 bonus to the roll. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the attack hits or misses.

action.name: War God's Blessing
action.shortDescription: When a creature within 30 feet of you makes an attack roll, you can use your reaction to grant that creature an additional +10 bonus to the roll, using Channel Divinity. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the attack hits or misses.

feature.name: Divine Strike
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. One on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage to the target.

feature.name: Divine Strike
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. One on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 2d8 radiant damage to the target.

feature.name: Avatar of Battle
feature.shortDescription: You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.
